channel.description: Recent content in SublimeText3 on Some Title

item.title: Build environment of LaTeX and R (Slightly Python) with Sublime Text3 (Windows)
item.description: # Sublime Text3 makes LaTeX and R (a little Python) easier to use Introduction For your own notes. Unexpectedly, I thought that I wouldn’t see the site about TeX in Sublime, I thought I would write about the environment I set up (Friend J’s Maru Pakuri). In SublimeText3, I will describe a series of setting procedures to make LaTeX and R (a little Python) easy to use. Make sure to restart Sublime accordingly.
